section.title: Overview
section.para: Time and Expense—otherwise known as xtte—is an xTuple extension package which may be applied to any xTuple ERP edition: PostBooks, Standard, or Manufacturing. The package is easy to install. And once installed, it seamlessly integrates time and expense functionality with your ERP.

note.para: For this chapter we will assume you have already installed xTuple ERP, version 3.6.0 or higher.

section.para: To install Time and Expense, you will need the following items:

listitem.para: This is the package installer. It is a cross-platform application which connects to your xTuple ERP database and installs the Time and Expense package (xtte). The Updater is the same tool that is used for upgrading xTuple ERP databases from one version to the next. It also converts xTuple ERP from one edition to the next (e.g., PostBooks to Standard).

This is the extension package which integrates time and expense features with your xTuple ERP. The file is loaded into the Updater, which in turn applies the package to your xTuple database. And like all xTuple database upgrade scripts, the file ends with a .gz extension.

section.title: Getting the Required Files
section.para: The Updater tool can be downloaded from the PostBooks project page on SourceForge.net. To reach the PostBooks project, follow these steps:

listitem.para: Point your web browser to http://sourceforge.net/
The following project page will appear:

section.para: Next, click on the "View all files" button (the smaller one, adjacent to the big green button). This will give you access to all the available folders. In the following screenshot, the Updater is folder #06:

Finally, expand the link for the latest version of the Updater folder (they should be in reverse chronological order, most recent first). Be sure to choose a download which corresponds to your operating system. The following screen shows version 2.2.2 of the Updater, available for Mac, Windows, or Linux:
Once you've downloaded the Updater and the xtte package, you are ready to begin the installation!

section.title: Installing the Package
section.para: Having xTuple ERP installed and running is a prerequisite for installing Time and Expense. Assuming this is the case, then you are ready to begin.

note.para: Before you install the Time and Expense package, you should first make a backup copy of your xTuple ERP database. This way you can always restore the backup copy should you encounter problems during the installation process.

section.para: To begin installing the Time and Expense package, the first step is to connect the Updater to your xTuple ERP database. The process for connecting is identical to the process used when logging in using your xTuple ERP client software.
The following screen shows the log in screen you are presented with when launch the Updater application:

mediaobject.caption: Connect to xTuple Database Using Updater

tip.para: If you are having trouble connecting to your xTuple ERP database with the Updater, select the OPTIONS button on the Log In screen to ensure your connection information is correct.

section.para: Once you successfully connect to the database, you are ready to load the xtte package. To begin loading the xtte package, follow these steps:

Once you locate the xtte package on your file system (e.g., xtte-2.0.0.gz), a short series of prerequisite checks will be performed. The following screen shows the results of a successful prerequisite check:

If the prerequisite check was successful, simply select the START UPDATE button to complete installation. Depending on the quality of your network connection, this final step of the installation process should complete quickly.

note.para: Contact your system administrator if you encounter errors or extreme slowness after selecting the START UPDATE button.

section.para: To verify the Time and Expense package has been successfully installed, log into xTuple ERP. Finally, navigate to the installed packages directory, using the following path: System > Design > Packages.
